description.title: SQL Transpiler (CLI)
description.content: Manipulates tens of thousands of SQL queries in a single instance using Java. SQL Dialects are converted in multiple stages and tested using JDBC

description.title: Billing Usages Application (RestAPI)
description.content: Processed heavily nested json data using Pandas to find out when a consumer has reached their usage limit from several factors. The data was then updated using a REST API, sent to a database and alerts were sent to the consumer.

description.title: Risk Management System (Full Stack)
description.content: Maintanance, bug fixes and new features for a risk management system for ports around the UK using .NET and SQL Server.
